00066 void OaxImport::Load(wxZipInputStream& stream)
00067 {
00068         // set pointer to first entry
00069         m_ptrZipEntry = stream.GetNextEntry();
00070 
00071         // walk through all entrys and push them into vector
00072         while (m_ptrZipEntry)
00073         {
00074                 // push pointer to vector
00075                 m_vector.push_back(m_ptrZipEntry);
00076 
00077                 // get next Entry
00078                 m_ptrZipEntry = stream.GetNextEntry();
00079         }
00080 
00081         // walk through all vector-entrys, skip .obj-files
00082         for (m_vectorit = m_vector.begin(); m_vectorit != m_vector.end(); m_vectorit++)
00083         {
00084                 // get actual zipEntry
00085                 m_ptrZipEntry = *m_vectorit;
00086 
00087                 // search entryname matches "*.xml"
00088                 if (m_ptrZipEntry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")))
00089                 {
00090                         // openEntry
00091                         stream.OpenEntry(*m_ptrZipEntry);
00092 
00093                         // check if there is only one entry, if yes, it is a primitive-oax
00094                         if (m_vector.size() == 1)
00095                         {
00096                                 // load primitivesXml-Stream
00097                                 LoadPrimitivesXml(stream);
00098                         }
00099                         // if more than one entries, assembly-oax
00100                         else
00101                         {
00102                                 // load assemblyXml-Stream
00103                                 LoadAssemblyXml(stream);
00104                         }
00105 
00106                         // entry found
00107                         continue;
00108                 }
00109 
00110                 // search entryname matches "*.mtl"
00111                 if (m_ptrZipEntry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.mtl")))
00112                 {
00113                         // openEntry
00114                         stream.OpenEntry(*m_ptrZipEntry);
00115 
00116                         // temporary string
00117                         wxString tmp;
00118 
00119                         // create wxStringOutputStream to get content of mtl file
00120                         wxStringOutputStream outString(&tmp);
00121 
00122                         // read zipstream and store content into tmp
00123                         stream.Read(outString);
00124 
00125                         // insert file name and its content into map
00126                         m_map->insert(std::pair<wxString, wxString>(m_ptrZipEntry->GetName(), tmp));
00127 
00128                         // entry found
00129                         continue;
00130                 }
00131         }
00132 
00133         // walk thorug all vector-entrys
00134         for (m_vectorit = m_vector.begin(); m_vectorit != m_vector.end(); m_vectorit++)
00135         {
00136                 // get actual zipEntry
00137                 m_ptrZipEntry = *m_vectorit;
00138 
00139                 // search entryname matches obj-filename
00140                 if (m_ptrZipEntry->GetName().Matches(m_objFilename))
00141                 {
00142                         // openEntry
00143                         stream.OpenEntry(*m_ptrZipEntry);
00144 
00145                         // load objfile
00146                         LoadObj(stream);
00147 
00148                         // obj-file found
00149                         continue;
00150                 }
00151         }
00152 }

00158 void OaxImport::Load(wxString& filename)
00159 {
00160         // create stream of m_filename
00161         wxFFileInputStream inFile(filename);
00162 
00163         // create zipstream
00164         wxZipInputStream stream(inFile);
00165 
00166         // load stream
00167         Load(stream);
00168 }

00174 void OaxImport::LoadAssemblyXml(wxInputStream& stream)
00175 {
00176         // temporary attributes
00177         double x, y, z;
00178 
00179         // temporary attribute tokenizer
00180         wxStringTokenizer tok;
00181 
00182         // create xmldocument of inpustream
00183         wxXmlDocument xml(stream);
00184 
00185         // create pointer to xmlnode
00186         wxXmlNode* node;
00187 
00188         // create pointer to xmlproperty
00189         wxXmlProperty* prop;
00190 
00191         // create wxString to store propertyvalues
00192         wxString value;
00193 
00194         // node to oaxml
00195         node = xml.GetRoot();
00196 
00197         // node to assemblyInformation
00198         node = node->GetChildren();
00199 
00200         // node to name
00201         node = node->GetChildren();
00202 
00203         // get name
00204         m_name = node->GetNodeContent();
00205 
00206         // node to author
00207         node = node->GetNext();
00208 
00209         // get author
00210         m_author = node->GetNodeContent();
00211 
00212         // node to Tags
00213         node = node->GetNext();
00214 
00215         // node to first Tag
00216         node = node->GetChildren();
00217 
00218         // walk through all tags
00219         while (node)
00220         {
00221                 // get content of tag and store in m_vecTags
00222                 m_vecTags.push_back(node->GetNodeContent());
00223 
00224                 // check if next exist, if not, leave
00225                 if (node->GetNext() == NULL)
00226                 {
00227                         break;
00228                 }
00229                 // everything ok, set next node
00230                 else
00231                 {
00232                         // set node to next group
00233                         node = node->GetNext();
00234                 }
00235         }
00236 
00237         // node to tags
00238         node = node->GetParent();
00239 
00240         // node to assemblyInformation
00241         node = node->GetParent();
00242 
00243         // node to data
00244         node = node->GetNext();
00245 
00246         // node to obj
00247         node = node->GetChildren();
00248 
00249         // prop to scale
00250         prop = node->GetProperties();
00251 
00252         // get value of scale
00253         value = prop->GetValue();
00254 
00255         // tokenize value
00256         tok.SetString(value, wxT(" "));
00257 
00258         // get x-scale
00259         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&x);
00260         m_scaleX = x;
00261 
00262         // get y-scale
00263         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&y);
00264         m_scaleY = y;
00265 
00266         // get z-scale
00267         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&z);
00268         m_scaleZ = z;
00269 
00270         // prop to locationOffset
00271         prop = prop->GetNext();
00272 
00273         // get value of locationOffset
00274         value = prop->GetValue();
00275 
00276         // tokenize value
00277         tok.SetString(value, wxT(" "));
00278 
00279         // get x-locationOffset
00280         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&x);
00281         m_locationOffsetX = x;
00282 
00283         // get y-locationOffset
00284         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&y);
00285         m_locationOffsetY = y;
00286 
00287         // get z-locationOffset
00288         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&z);
00289         m_locationOffsetZ = z;
00290 
00291         // prop to orientationOffset
00292         prop = prop->GetNext();
00293 
00294         // get value of orientationOffset
00295         value = prop->GetValue();
00296 
00297         // tokenize value
00298         tok.SetString(value, wxT(" "));
00299 
00300         // get x-orientationOffset
00301         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&x);
00302         m_orientationOffsetX = x;
00303 
00304         // get y-orientationOffset
00305         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&y);
00306         m_orientationOffsetY = y;
00307 
00308         // get z-orientationOffset
00309         tok.GetNextToken().ToDouble(&z);
00310         m_orientationOffsetZ = z;
00311 
00312         // prop to ref
00313         prop = prop->GetNext();
00314 
00315         // get value of ref
00316         m_objFilename = prop->GetValue();
00317 }

00397                 if (node->GetName() == wxT("cuboid"))

00401

00406                         if (value == wxT("true"))
00407                         {
00408                                 m_visible = true;
00409                         }
00410                         // not true -> false

00412                         {
00413                                 m_visible = false;
00414                         }

00692 
00697 void OaxImport::LoadObj(wxInputStream& stream)
00698 {
00699         // create ObjectImportobject
00700         ObjectImport import(&stream, m_map);
00701 
00702         // placeholder for ObjectImport-call
00703         m_ptrAssembly = import.getAssembly();
00704 
00705         // set x-scale
00706         m_ptrAssembly->setScaleX(m_scaleX);
00707 
00708         // set y-scale
00709         m_ptrAssembly->setScaleY(m_scaleY);
00710 
00711         // set z-scale
00712         m_ptrAssembly->setScaleZ(m_scaleZ);
00713 
00714         // set assemly-name
00715         m_ptrAssembly->setName(m_name);
00716 
00717         // temporary pointer to get access to wrapper
00718         Assembly* wrapper = import.getWrapper();
00719 
00720         // set x-offset
00721         wrapper->setX(m_locationOffsetX);
00722 
00723         // set y-offset
00724         wrapper->setY(m_locationOffsetY);
00725 
00726         // set z-offset
00727         wrapper->setZ(m_locationOffsetZ);
00728 
00729         // set x-orientation
00730         wrapper->setPhi(m_orientationOffsetX);
00731 
00732         // set y-orientation
00733         wrapper->setRho(m_orientationOffsetY);
00734 
00735         // set z-orientation
00736         wrapper->setTheta(m_orientationOffsetZ);
00737 }
